about_the_game:
ODDLI is a casual puzzle game about creating satisfying loops. Solve moving puzzles where the only obstacle is your past self. Reach the goal with your character, avoid your previous movements and watch it repeat your path. Continue reaching goals, while creating mesmerizing choreographies.

Move and avoid your previous versions

In this game, you will create ODDLI satisfying loops while you solve unique puzzles created by your own movement. You just have to move one character to reach a goal, and avoid colliding with your previous movements.

Solve puzzles created by your movement

Every time you reach a goal, a new character will apear on the map. You will be controlling the new character, while the previous versions will stay in the map repeating your path. With this unique mechanic, every game will feel different, because you create your own obstacles and solve puzzles in your own way.

Play with cute characters in cozy biomes

The minimalist elements of our game come together to create a surrealist but comfy world. Everything in this game is hand-made, and we want to surprise our players with original ideas in familiar environments.

Create ODDLI satisfying loops with your movement 

Every time you finish a level you'll get a 360 view of your movements. Sit back and enjoy your creation! Every aspect of the game, from the visuals to the original soundtrack, are designed to give you a satisfying feeling.

Key Features

  • Simple core loop of moving around step by step while avoiding collisions

  • Levels with different themes and colorful characters

  • Achieve your goals by creating satisfying loops

  • Complete challenges or play in endless mode to place as many toys as you can.
